## SuggestStateMatch.text property

Full text of match including the activation character

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
text: MatchValue;
```

## Remarks

For a `char` of `'@'` and query of `'awesome'` `text.full` would be `'@awesome'`<!-- -->.
